hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir said:"The Messenger of Allah forbade Muhaqalah, Muzahanah, Mukhabarah, Mu'awamah, and selling with an exception unless it is defined but he gave concession allowing 'Araya

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ بَيْعِ الثُّنْيَا، حَتَّى تُعْلَمَ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibitionof Selling With An Exception, Unless It Is Defined
